inbox.query: select d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE contains(d, 'PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:swsdp/cm:documentLibrary/cm:Meeting_x0020_Notes/*"')

select d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE contains(d, 'PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:swsdp/cm:documentLibrary/cm:Budget_x0020_Files/cm:Invoices/*"')

select d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE contains(d, 'PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:swsdp/cm:documentLibrary/cm:Agency_x0020_Files/cm:Contracts/*"')

select d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE contains(d, 'PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:swsdp/cm:documentLibrary/cm:Agency_x0020_Files/cm:Mock-Ups/*"')
SELECT d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE d.cmis:objectTypeId='cmis:document' and d.cmis:createdBy = 'mjackson'
SELECT d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE d.cmis:objectTypeId='cmis:document' and d.cmis:createdBy = 'abeecher'
select d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE contains(d, 'PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:swsdp/cm:documentLibrary/cm:Presentations/*"')

select d.*, t.* FROM cmis:document as d join cm:titled as t on d.cmis:objectId = t.cmis:objectId WHERE contains(d, 'PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:swsdp/cm:documentLibrary/cm:Agency_x0020_Files/cm:Images/*"')
